mapper.select: select pre_comment.* from member_interaction member_interaction join pre_comment pre_comment on member_interaction.business_id = pre_comment.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
select member_info.nick_name, pre_comment.* from member_interaction member_interaction join member_info member_info on member_interaction.member_id = member_info.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
